transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Yes. Hi, mai Rukhsar baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, manager. 
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Haan. Mam actually kal aapki Manish ji se baat hui hai na, kal evening me?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To ek feedback unke liye gaya tha aapke paas me, to aapka feedback jo hai wo not satisfied aaya hai. To aap mujhe batayenge kya problem face kar rahe mam abhi?
Customer: Aap mere manager ho?
Executive: Nahi mai unki manager hu.
Customer: Achha, kyuki mujhe koi contact nahi karta hai aur karte hai to every time naye log contact karte hai. Thik hai? And after it's been the same issue again and again. Mere jo products listed hai na, wo unhone pehle barabar nahi kiye the. Aur phir uske baad ispe they have not, kya bolte hai, they have not listed the products properly. And when they listed it, they missed like they put the wrong images and I had to delete it manually and upload it all by myself. To unhone mujhe kya bola tha jo last manager the uska naam yaad nahi hai ki product description aur wagera wo log sab dalenge. They'll, maine unko sab list of products diye the mere and told them I'll provide them with the images but they didn't do anything.
Customer: (unclear)
Executive: Okay. So mam currently we have your 160 products in, actually in our portal last. 161.
Customer: I have, I have none of that. They have not done anything. Wrong kiya tha to maine pura sab delete kiya tha manually. They said okay we'll help you optimize the listing so they'll add description etcetera but wo bhi kuch nahi kiya.
Executive: Okay. So is product addition jo hota hai, product, product addition jo hota hai, wo koi seller yaani ki jaise aap khud se bhi kar sakti hai aur ya phir agar aapke account manager se keh rahi hai to aap video meet pe Google meet pe aa jaiye aur aap log sath me baith ke usko kar sakte hai.
Customer: Kitna, itna video meet zoom. Every time I have to take video meet. I feel like there's just fulfilling some formality of doing the video meet.
Executive: Mam video meet is a kind of like, mam ek tarike se interaction karne ka this is the only way.
Customer: No, no, no. I understand what you're saying. But I feel they force me to come on video meet and they just show me ke aap buyly consume karo mere samne ek and then they do that and then they're done. So I feel like there's some take in your task list or what that they need to do because that's it, that's all they've done.
Executive: Okay mam aap jaise Maharashtra me hai, thik hai? Hum log Noida 135 me hai. To hum log aapse interaction ke liye aapse milne nahi aa sakte hai. Kyuki jab aap service based profile me hote hai to.
Customer: I am okay with that but they have never tried to do that as well, right?
Aap mujhe connect karao, mai karwati hu.
Executive: Nahi mai ye kar sakti hu aapke liye ki mai aapki jo account manager hai Priya Singh, thik hai? Mai ek meeting schedule karwati hu Priya Singh se aapki. Aap please apna jo bhi aapne, aapne Priya ko bheja hai apna sara wo product material sab kuch?
Customer: Uska number hi nahi hai, kuch bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Mai waise Priya se aapki kafi baar baat hui hai pehle mai dekh pa rahi hu yaha pe updated hai.
Customer: Maine kabhi uthaya nahi hoga phone usko bolo mujhe whatsapp kare.
Executive: Mai ye kar deti hu ki mai Priya ko ek baar bolti hu ki aapse video meet pe connect kar le, thik hai? Mam 161 products hai. Agar hum inka isme videos bhi add karne lagenge to bahut time lagega to agar aap aur wo milke sath me karenge na to jaldi ho jayega aur better ho jayega kyuki dekhiye agar usme kuch bhi details nikali aap usko photos share kar denge ya description.
Customer: Mere 300 products hai, phir 151 add hua hai.
Executive: Currently aapke paas 300 products hai?
Customer: Plus 300 plus.
Executive: 300 plus. Hmm.
Customer: Do issue hai. Maine unko photos bheje the jo mujhe abhi pata nahi naam kiska hai, maine bheje hai do teen managers ko bheje hai. Every time mujhe lagta hai every month manager change hota hai. To unko photos bheje the aur list of products bheja tha. Aapke jo baki ke hai wo aap upload kar do.
Customer: (unclear)
Customer: Maine bhi karti hu, maine kiye hai ye pure sab. But mujhe jo part nahi pata hai ki optimize kaise karte hai ya description wagera to wo to dal sakte hai na.
Executive: Haan, agree with it. Ek kaam karte hai na mai aapki manager jo account manager hai na unke sath ek meeting aapki fix karati hu. Aapko whatsapp karwati hu aapke same number pe, thik hai? Aap Google meet pe connect kariye wo do kaam ho jayenge. Ek to thoda sa addition ho jayega aapke product me, dusra wo DIY kar denge ke aap kaise khud se usko kar bhi sakte hai, thik hai? Mai kar deti hu kyuki aapne bola na 300 plus products hai. To aap pehle wo products apne account manager ko bhejenge phir wo unko update karega. Time taking process ho jayega. Mai easy way kaise hai aap ek sath paanch product bhi add kar sakte hai. To wo kaise hoga wo DIY.
Customer: Wo part maine kiya hai na. Hmm. Hmm. Thik hai aap karao meeting schedule karo.
Executive: Thik hai mai meeting karwati hu, okay. Aap 10 minute dijiye mai karwati hu, thik hai, okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- No consistent contact person; new people every time.

- Products not listed properly; wrong images used.

- Previous managers failed to add product descriptions.

- Feels forced to attend video meetings.

- Wants help with optimization and descriptions.



Resolution:

- Executive will schedule a meeting with Priya Singh.

- Priya will connect via video meet.

- Priya will guide on adding products and DIY methods.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to schedule meeting with Priya Singh.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product listing, account manager, video meet, optimization
